product_name: Oakley Gore-Tex BioZone Down Pants - Men's
long_description: Not sure how the weather's going to play out on the slopes or an alpine summit? Down-insulated BioZoneTM pants with Gore-Tex fabric will keep you warm and dry no matter what the day holds.
short_description: Not sure how the weather's going to play out on the slopes or an alpine summit? Down-insulated BioZoneTM pants with Gore-Tex fabric will keep you warm and dry no matter what the day holds.
